tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories export_history --history_id "$history_id"
#if $gzip --gzip "$gzip" #end if #if $include_hidden --include_hidden "$include_hidden" #end if #if $include_deleted --include_deleted "$include_deleted" #end if #if $wait --wait "$wait" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: include_hidden
input.help: whether to include hidden datasets in the export

input.name: include_deleted
input.help: whether to include deleted datasets in the export

input.name: wait
input.help: if ``True``, block until the export is ready; else, return immediately

tool.help: Start a job to create an export archive for the given history.
